title: Record: A Farah Volek Story
description: Meet Tom. A father with nothing left to lose. His son Alan went missing. Abducted by two vile psychopaths who make snuff films. Out of options, Tom calls upon a mysterious vigilante, Farah Volek who is a master of MMA and all types of weaponry. Using her skills, she vows to bring Alan back home-while leaving a bloody trail in her wake...
author: J.A.  Flynn
